DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the safety and efficacy of oral tinidazole for the treatment of bacterial vaginosis.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Bacterial Vaginosis With Oral Tinidazole
DOC.detailed_description: Tinidazole is a second-generation nitroimidazole i.e. an updated form of the standard drug used to treat bacterial vaginosis (metronidazole). Two dosing regimens are being compared to placebo to treat bacterial vaginosis, one of the most common vaginal infections.
DOC.criteria: Clinical and microbiological diagnosis of bacterial vaginosis Other sexually transmitted disease
